hero.title: Welcome to Mubfilters
hero.subtitle: Quality Filters For a Better Cigarette

3dmodel.title: Explore Our Filters in 3D
3dmodel.subtitle: Interact with our high-quality cigarette filters in 3D
3dmodel.description: Experience our premium filter quality through this interactive 3D model. You can rotate, zoom, and examine every detail of our cigarette filters.
3dmodel.instructions: Use your mouse to rotate, scroll to zoom, and right-click to pan

features.visualization.desc: Examine every detail of our filters

about.title: About Mulia Usaha Bersama
about.description: PT Mulia Usaha Bersama (MUB) is a manufacturing company located in Malang, a picturesque mountain town known for its cigarette factories. Founded in 2013, we help fulfill the demands of the growing cigarette industry in Indonesia and across South East Asia.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We produce and supply quality filters to the cigarette industry across Indonesia and abroad

regular.title: Filter Mono
regular.description:
Diameter: 7.7mm / 7.8mm
Length: 100mm / 108mm / 120mm / 132mm
PD and hardness customizable

mild.title: Filter Capsule
mild.description:
Diameter: 6.9mm
Length: 92mm / 100mm / 108mm / 120mm / 132mm
PD and hardness customizable

bold.title: Filter Super Slim
bold.description:
Diameter: 7.4mm
Length: 92mm / 100mm / 108mm / 120mm / 132mm
PD and hardness customizable
